item.title: This Test Can See a Heart Attack in Your Future
item.description: Coronary artery calcium testing can reveal plaque in arteries, offering a more precise estimate of a patient’s risk. Yet the test remains underused.

item.title: What will rescission do to foreign aid? Details are murky. Here's what we found out
item.description: Congress approved the clawing back of $7.9 billion in foreign aid pledges. Who ends up losing out?
